original_title: Pros Inc wins SriLankan Airlines revenue software deal
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – US-based PROS Incorporated has been awarded a contract to provide revenue optimization software for Sri Lanka’s national carrier, a statement said.
The cabinet of ministers had approved the award of the contract after calling for international competitive bids.
A standing procurement committee has selected Pros Incorporated to implement revenue optimization software at SriLankan Airlines for 5-years for 3,243,600 Us dollars.
